content: Hello Daniel, thank you for applying for the software developer position. Can you tell me about your programming experience and any languages you are proficient in?
Good morning, Daniel! Glad to have you here. Could you please outline your previous experience working on software development projects?

Previously I've worked for PayPal, I founded the company, following that I dived into automating driving with Tesla, following that I bought SpaceX and right now I'm working on a project called X, I've just bought Twitter.

Wow, it sounds like you have had some impressive experience in the tech industry, Daniel! Could you tell me more about the specific software development projects you have worked on at PayPal and Tesla?
